results.title: The overbilling scandal that deepened Air Albania's losses
results.snippet: This latest decision by the Supreme Court shows Air Albania's complaint for excessive billing, accepted by CEO Sinan Dilek. This overbilling is part of the loss presented in the balance sheet declared by Turkish Airlines for "Air Albania", material that was also published in the media.

results.title: "Air Albania" ends up in court, fails to pay 5 million euros in ...
results.snippet: The Court of Appeals orders the company "Air Albania" to pay around 5 million euros in overdue invoices to a company that supplies food to passengers on board. This court decision, although made on May 13, 2025, has not yet been reflected in the National Business Center. The airline "Air Albania", which is best known for providing a jet taxi to Prime Minister Edi Rama, is refusing to pay ...

results.title: Air Albania heading for bankruptcy, the two Sinans lead the company to ...
results.snippet: To avoid a scandal, the director of Civil Aviation, according to sources, ordered Air Albania to publicly declare that the aircraft was under maintenance, while there are official communications proving the opposite. Inside sources possess official communications proving the opposite.

results.title: The overbilling scandal that deepened Air Albania's losses
results.snippet: This latest decision by the Supreme Court shows Air Albania's complaint for excessive billing, accepted by CEO Sinan Dilek. results.title: Americans sue Air Albanian in English court: It stopped paying rent in ...
results.snippet: An American company from Florida has filed a lawsuit against the Albanian flag carrier, Air Albania, as the first defendant, and Turkish Airlines as the second defendant, before the High Court of England and Wales, alleging breach of lease contracts for two A320-200 aircraft.

results.title: "Lawsuits, accusations and flight cancellations": 'Air Albania' heading ...
results.snippet: The Boeing 737-800 flew for Air Albania for just one month. In recent weeks, rumors have circulated in regional media about an imminent closure of Air Albania. Numerous flight cancellations due to cancellation of offered destinations, as well as reports of unpaid employee salaries, have fueled these rumors recently.

results.title: Wiper malware found in analysis of Iran-linked attacks on Albanian ...
results.snippet: Researchers at ClearSky said they spotted wiper malware called No-Justice in their investigation of attacks on Albania's parliament, two telecoms and an airline.

results.title: Albania Parliament Cyberattack Sparks Heightened Concerns
results.snippet: Cybersecurity Concerns Heightened as Albania Parliament Faces Another Cyberattack This recent incident follows reports of cyberattacks on a local cell phone provider and an air flight company on the same day.

results.title: A cyberattack targets Albanian Parliament's data system, halting its ...
results.snippet: TIRANA, Albania (AP) â€” Albania's Parliament said on Tuesday that it had suffered a cyberattack with hackers trying to get into its data system, resulting in a temporary halt in its services.
